About this site

This site has been built to help you decide if buying a sim-only contract is right for you and if it is, which contract is best suited to your needs.

This site displays prices from the major mobile phone networks in the UK, including:

  • Three
  • O2
  • Vodaphone
  • EE
  • giffgaff
  • Lycamobile
  • Virgin mobile

Prices are checked frequently by a human and this site is updated with the latest deals that each network offers.

If you have any questions about this site, you can contact simtastic.co.uk
